Actions.Name: Spinning Kick
Actions.Description: Repeat the following effect three times:
Actions.Effects: Dash 1, then deal 2 damage to all adjacent foes. Must move in the same direction.

Actions.Name: Cartwheel
Actions.Description: The [name] dashes up to 3 spaces, then deals damage to an adjacent foe equal to the number of spaces it dashed.

Actions.Name: Partner Work
Actions.Description: The [name] marks an ally. That ally gains evasion and +1 boon on attacks while in range 3 of the [name].

Actions.Name: Acrobatics
Actions.Description: The [name] takes a nimble stance. While in this stance, they gain evasion, and when targeted by an ability, may dash 1 after the ability resolves.
